Prev:Target Up:Index Next:Game
1-Main Panel Buttons
1-4 The little cool things that can make you feel special.
List ON: your name will appear in the /gmlist user command results.
List OFF: you have more important duties than petitions support. Your name will stay out of the support list.
Diet: A toggle for you to carry big amounts of stuff free of weight penalties.
Invis: Toggle for invisibility mode.
Petitions: View petitions list.
Silence: Toggle for whisper acceptance mode.
TradeOff: Toggle for trade refusal mode.
Invul: Toggle for invulnerability mode.
Wyvern: Ride a wyvern, pretend you own a castle, show off.
Strider: Ride a Strider, pretend you have a trained pet.
Enchant: Open up an Enchant Items dialog. Affects target.
GM Shop: Too lazy to create items by ID? Get them here for free.
